Namespace Vuplex.WebView

Classes

AuthRequestedEventArgs

BaseKeyboard

BaseWebViewPrefab

BridgeMessage

A simple base class that can be used for sending messages from C# to a WebView's JavaScript and vice versa as serialized JSON.

CanvasKeyboard

Like the Keyboard prefab, except optimized for use in a Canvas. You can add a CanvasKeyboard to your scene either by dragging the CanvasKeyboard.prefab file into a Canvas via the editor or by programmatically calling CanvasKeyboard.Instantiate(). For an example, please see 3D WebView's CanvasWorldSpaceDemo scene.

CanvasPointerInputDetector

CanvasWebViewPrefab

CanvasWebViewPrefab is a prefab that makes it easy to view and interact with an IWebView in a 2D Canvas. It takes care of creating an IWebView, displaying its texture, and handling pointer interactions from the user, like clicking, dragging, and scrolling. So, all you need to do is specify a URL or HTML to load, and then the user can view and interact with it. For use outside of a Canvas, see WebViewPrefab instead.

ClickedEventArgs

Event args for Clicked.

ConsoleMessageEventArgs

Event args for ConsoleMessageLogged.

Cookie

An HTTP cookie.

DefaultPointerInputDetector

DownloadChangedEventArgs

Event args for IWithDownloads.DownloadProgressChanged.

EventArgs<T>

A generic version of System.EventArgs.

FileSelectionEventArgs

FocusedInputFieldChangedEventArgs

Event args for FocusedInputFieldChanged.

Keyboard

A 3D, on-screen keyboard prefab that you can hook up to a webview for typing. You can add a Keyboard to your scene either by dragging the Keyboard.prefab file into it via the editor or by programmatically calling Keyboard.Instantiate(). For use in a Canvas, please see CanvasKeyboard instead.

PointerEventArgs

Event args to indicate a pointer event (i.e. mouse event).

PointerOptions

Options to alter pointer methods, like PointerUp() and PointerDown().

PopupRequestedEventArgs

Event args for PopupRequested.

ProgressChangedEventArgs

Event args for LoadProgressChanged.

ScriptDialogEventArgs

ScriptDialogEventArgs<T>

ScrolledEventArgs

Event args to indicate that a prefab has been scrolled.

TerminatedEventArgs

Event args for Terminated.

UrlAction

UrlActionType

UrlChangedEventArgs

Event args for UrlChanged.

Web

Web is the top-level static class for the 3D WebView plugin. It contains static methods for configuring the module and creating resources.

WebViewPrefab

WebViewPrefab is a prefab that makes it easy to view and interact with an IWebView in 3D world space. It takes care of creating an IWebView, displaying its texture, and handling pointer interactions from the user, like clicking, dragging, and scrolling. So, all you need to do is specify a URL or HTML to load, and then the user can view and interact with it. For use in a Canvas, see CanvasWebViewPrefab instead.

Structs

TouchEvent

A touch event that can be dispatched with StandaloneWebView.DispatchTouchEvent().

WebViewOptions

Options that can be passed to WebViewPrefab.Instantiate() or SetOptionsForInitialization() to alter the webview that the prefab creates during initialization.

Interfaces

IPointerInputDetector

An interface that can be passed to WebViewPrefab.SetPointerInputDetector() CanvasWebViewPrefab.SetPointerInputDetector() to override how the prefab detects pointer input. For example implementations of this interface, please see 3D WebView's DefaultPointerInputDetector.cs and CanvasPointerInputDetector.cs scripts.

IWebView

IWebView is the primary interface for loading and interacting with web content. It contains methods and properties for common browser-related functionality, like LoadUrl(), GoBack(), Reload(), and ExecuteJavaScript().

IWithChangingTexture

Unity added support for using Texture2D.CreateExternalTexture() with Vulkan in 2020.2, but support for Texture2D.UpdateExternalTexture() wasn't added until 2022.1. So, this interface is used by 3D WebView for Android with Gecko Engine to update the texture when Vulkan is used with versions of Unity prior to 2022.1. https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/android-vulkan-texture2d-dot-updateexternaltexture-does-not-respond-when-a-project-is-built-on-android-with-vulkan-graphics-api

IWithDownloads

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports file downloads.

IWithFileSelection

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports file selection. This interface doesn't cause a file selection UI to automatically be shown, but the application can use this interface's FileSelectionRequested event to detect when file selection is requested and then use a system API or third party asset to present the user with a file selection UI.

IWithKeyDownAndUp

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports separate KeyDown() and KeyUp() methods.

IWithKeyModifiers

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports a version of HandleKeyboardInput that accepts key modifiers, which can be used to trigger keyboard shortcuts.

IWithMovablePointer

IWithMutableAudio

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports muting audio.

IWithNative2DMode

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports Native 2D Mode, which makes it so that 3D WebView positions a native 2D webview in front of the Unity game view instead of displaying web content as a texture in the Unity scene. For more info, please see this article.

IWithNativeOnScreenKeyboard

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports using a native on-screen keyboard.

IWithPointerDownAndUp

IWithPopups

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports opening popups. For detailed examples, please see 3D WebView's PopupDemo and CanvasPopupDemo scenes.

IWithSettableUserAgent

An interface implemented by a webview if it supports changing the User-Agent of an individual webview instance.

Enums

ConsoleMessageLevel

Levels for messages logged to the JavaScript console.

DragMode

Options for how drag interactions affect WebViewPrefab and CanvasWebViewPrefab.

FocusedInputFieldType

Indicates the type of input field focused.

KeyModifier

Flags that indicate modifier keys for IWithKeyModifiers.HandleKeyboardInput().

MouseButton

Enum for the different mouse buttons.

PopupMode

Options for how a webview that implements IWithPopups handles popups.

ProgressChangeType

TerminationType

TouchEventType

Touch event type values for TouchEvent.Type.
